| Symbol        | Meaning                   | Unit            | Type       | Example Formula            |
|---------------|---------------------------|------------------|------------|-----------------------------|
| `F`           | Force                     | Newton (N)       | Vector     | `F = m * a`                |
| `m`           | Mass                      | Kilogram (kg)    | Scalar     | Used in `F = m * a`        |
| `a`           | Acceleration              | m/sÂ²             | Vector     | Used in `F = m * a`        |
| `P`           | Pressure                  | Pascal (Pa)      | Scalar     | `P = F / A` or `P = (m * a) / A` |
| `A`           | Area                      | mÂ²               | Scalar     | Used in `P = F / A`        |
| `KE`          | Kinetic Energy            | Joule (J)        | Scalar     | `KE = 0.5 * m * vÂ²`        |
| `v`           | Velocity (speed + direction) | m/s           | Vector     | Used in `p = m * v` and `KE` |
| `p`           | Momentum                  | kgÂ·m/s           | Vector     | `p = m * v`                |
| `Î”L`          | Change in length          | Meter (m)        | Scalar     | `Î”L = Î± * Lâ‚€ * Î”T`         |
| `Î±`           | Thermal expansion rate    | 1/Â°C             | Scalar     | Used in thermal expansion  |
| `Î”T`          | Change in temperature     | Â°C or K          | Scalar     | Used in thermal expansion  |
